column4: Hello can anyone tell me if there are mirrors that host ubuntu packages and are organised by release? Such as a repo of just the packages for Ubuntu 8.04.2, so that one doesnt have to guess as to what package goes with which release?
Seems to be the standard for other distros and Im not sure if Ubuntu has that.
ya they come in the sources.list
as in what exactly you want?? the mirror site?
